def calculate_flesch_kincaid_grade_level(paragraph):
    # Calculate the Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level
    total_words = len(paragraph.split())
    total_sentences = paragraph.count('.') + paragraph.count('!') + paragraph.count('?')
    total_syllables = sum(lib.num_syllables(word) for word in paragraph.split())
    
    flesch_kincaid_grade_level = 0.39 * (total_words / total_sentences) + 11.8 * (total_syllables / total_words) - 15.59
    
    return flesch_kincaid_grade_level

import math

def calculate_flesch_kincaid_grade_level(total_words, total_sentences, total_syllables):
    # Calculate Flesch-Kincaid Grade Level
    grade_level = 0.39 * (total_words / total_sentences) + 11.8 * (total_syllables / total_words) - 15.59
    return round(grade_level, 2)
